Ernst Reissner wrote:

> dogmatic attitudes like
> 
>  > The short version: No, you can't, and you shouldn't, because those are
> 3
>  > different tests.
> 
> do not convince me.

It's not dogma; it's a summary of conclusions based on years of practice.

> by the way: searching the archives shows pluralism on that question.

...and it shows the reasoning behind both sides. Certainly, I would want 
the original poster to see both sides and decide for himself.

Please don't be so quick to judge. It doesn't help your credibility.
